title: Don't Follow the Lights (6C38)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If Smeagol wins a skirmish, add a burden to discard a minion.
Lore:	”'Careful, careful now or Hobbits go down to join the dead ones and light little candles.'”
Rarity:	C
